Package com.github.m5c.livepoll

Class Poll

java.lang.Object
com.github.m5c.livepoll.Poll
public class Poll
extends Object
Represents all static and dynmically collected data of a poll. Note that one poll can be cast multiple times and therefore the URL associated to a poll is not stored inside the poll object.
Author:
Maximilian Schiedermeier

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Poll​(String topic, String[] options)
    Constructor.
    Poll​(String topic, String[] options, int solutionIndex, String explanation)
    Overloaded contructor that also allows setting of solution and explanation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Getter to look up justification of the correct answer.

    Returns string array with all possible options for this poll.

    Getter to look up the index of the right answer entry in the optionVotes map.

  • Constructor Details

    • Poll

      public Poll​(String topic, String[] options)
      Constructor. Sets up topic and options/vote-amount map. This constructor sets solution index and explanation to default/empty values.
      Parameters:
      topic - as the final topic for this poll.
      options - as the string options for all possible answers.

    • Poll

      public Poll​(String topic, String[] options, int solutionIndex, String explanation)
      Overloaded contructor that also allows setting of solution and explanation.
      Parameters:
      topic - as the final topic for this poll.
      options - as the string options for all possible answers.
      solutionIndex - as the number of the correct answer.
      explanation - as additional text to jsutify the right answer.

  • Method Details

    • getTopic

      public String getTopic()
      Getter for this poll's topic.
      Returns:
      the string representing this poll's topic.

    • getOptions

      public String[] getOptions()
      Returns string array with all possible options for this poll.
      Returns:
      all available options in order.

    • voteForOption

      public void voteForOption​(String option)
      Adds a vote for a given option.
      Parameters:
      option - the string for the selected poll response option.

    • getVotes

      public int getVotes​(String option)
      Getter to look up the amount of votes for a given option.
      Parameters:
      option - as the sanitized / hyphenized option to look up.
      Returns:
      the amount of votes received for this option so far.

    • getSolutionIndex

      public int getSolutionIndex()
      Getter to look up the index of the right answer entry in the optionVotes map.
      Returns:
      int as index.

    • getExplanation

      public String getExplanation()
      Getter to look up justification of the correct answer.
      Returns:
      String as explanation.
